description:
A feature-rich uploader from uppy.io  Includes multi-file picker w/ preview. Record video directly with webcam + mic and save directly to bubble aws.  Limit file type uploads and more.

DEMO:
https://uppyuploader.bubbleapps.io/

Please note: 
This plugin has the standard limitations of the bubble platform such as 50mb max file upload and no 'server side' features for handling files.
name: Uppy File + Webcam Uploader
plugin_instructions:
see: uppyuploader.bubbleapps.io for implementation
1) Place element on page. 
2) create workflow with action 'Uppy Start Upload'
3) Workflow trigger 'a file upload complete' to process each file that is uploaded
